Topic.Title: How do you say "if attribute is not equal to"?

Posts.EditableText:
This seems like it should be simple, but nothing I'm trying is working. The documentation says you can display text conditionally like this:

[quote:lpq8jui6][code:lpq8jui6]{if gender=male:You are a man.}{else:You are a woman.}[/code:lpq8jui6][/quote:lpq8jui6]

But how do you negate it? None of the following seem to work:

[code:lpq8jui6]{if current_room not = Yard: You're not in the yard.}[/code:lpq8jui6]
[code:lpq8jui6]{if not current_room = Yard: You're not in the yard.}[/code:lpq8jui6]
[code:lpq8jui6]{if current_room != Yard: You're not in the yard.}[/code:lpq8jui6]

Posts.EditableText:
I don't know squiffy but perhaps you can do this:
[code:433nkilv]{if current_room = Yard: }{else :You're not in the yard.}[/code:433nkilv]
